amendment.description: To specify the availability of amounts for the Versatile, Advanced Affordable Turbine Engine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3535 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3535 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S7381; text: CR S7381) To specify the availability of amounts for the Versatile, Advanced Affordable Turbine Engine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3535 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3535 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kyl.
